review_blob: bitterness is harsh and unpleasant. there is a muddled maltiness to the taste. aroma is subdued, but not bad. not much else to it.

beer_brewer_name: Magic Hat Brewing Company (North American Breweries)
review_blob:
I usually enjoy their beers, and I especially dig their IPAs (Blind Faith was quite good), but this one is just kind of so-so. Its supposed to be a Black IPA, but Im honestly only picking up the faintest hint of hops in the nose and taste. Theres almost no aroma whatsoever, really, unless you sniff the bottle right after uncapping. 

This basically comes across as a kind of middle of the road, thin-bodied porter. Little bit of roastiness, not much more.
